title: Crocodile Dundee
abstract: One of the most internationally successful of Australian feature films, 'Crocodile Dundee' took larrikin Paul Hogan to a  Hollywood career.
description: A New York reporter is intrigued by stories of an Australian crocodile hunter, Mick 'Crocodile' Dundee, and accompanies him on a journey through the bush. She entices him back to Manhattan where his easy-going approach to the dangers of life in a big city make him a success in New York society. Stars Paul Hogan and Linda Kozlowski.
